text:
@Yamiche Sure he did.The man has no sense of responsibity  whatsoever. He along with Fox and Sean Hannity in particular is responsible for 2 weeks of misinformation. Who knows how much of a handle we'd have on this Virus if Trump hadn't been so irresponsible.
#CoronaVirus
